related_questions.question:
(Sco    Mr. Ringo : Who is the best chef in your family?
Penny
Mr. ringo Really? I thought your father don't know how to cook!​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Mr. Ringo : Who is the best chef in your family?

Penny: My father is the best chef in my family.

Mr. ringo Really? I thought your father doesn't know how to cook!​

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Simple Present Tense karena menjelaskan tentang fakta.

Simple Present Tense:

Nominal: (+) Subject + tobe (is/am/are) + Noun (kata benda)

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
CAUTION    LIVE, CHILDREN PLAYING

 What does the above caution mean?
A.	Children are playing games around the place.
B.	Children are not allowed to play around the area.
C.	It is the place for children to play around here.
D.	You have to be careful because children are playing there.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. You have to be careful because children are playing there.

Semoga benar dan menjadi jawaban terbaik ya :)

Jawaban:

D you have to be careaful because children are playing there

maaf kalau salah

btw
